title: Full Stack Web Development
description: Learn to build modern web applications using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and MongoDB.

instructor.name: John Doe
instructor.experience: 7+ years building and teaching web apps.

reviews.review: Amazing course, covered full stack thoroughly.
Good content, could use more advanced projects.

title: Data Science Bootcamp
description: Master Python, statistics, machine learning, and real-world data analysis projects in one complete course.

instructor.name: Jane Smith
instructor.about: Data Scientist with industry and academic experience.
instructor.experience: 6+ years teaching data science and machine learning.

reviews.review: Loved the projects, but Python basics could be improved.

title: Mastering React and Redux
description: Deep dive into building scalable frontend apps using React, Redux Toolkit, and modern hooks.

reviews.review: Perfect for React developers wanting to master Redux.
Redux part is great, could use more real-world examples.

title: Python for Beginners
description: Start coding with Python from scratch. Perfect for beginners with no programming background.

instructor.name: Emily Brown
instructor.about: Software engineer passionate about teaching coding.

reviews.review: Perfect for absolute beginners, very easy to follow.
Good start, but would love more exercises.

title: Machine Learning A-Z
description: Hands-on course to understand algorithms, model building, and deploying machine learning solutions.

instructor.name: Andrew Lee
instructor.about: ML engineer with real-world deployment expertise.
instructor.experience: 5+ years building and teaching ML systems.

reviews.review: Very practical and real-world focused. Loved it!
Great explanations, deployment section is gold.
